patthana13.15:1.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:1.1_1: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:1.1_2: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:1.1_3: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasammattaniyato ca naaniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:1.1_4: Micchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato ca nasammattaniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:2.1_0: Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:2.1_1: Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:2.1_2: Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:2.1_3: Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato ca naaniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:2.1_4: Sammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato ca nasammattaniyato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana13.15:3.1_0: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana13.15:4.1_0: Micchattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana13.15:5.1_0: Sammattaniyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana13.15:6.1_1: ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate ekūnavīsa. (Sabbattha vitthāretabbaṁ.)
